title: Here's the chat log. Tell me why I got banned for 14 days
body:
http://link.email.riotgames.com/YesConnect/HtmlMessagePreview?a=HCCT_etp7Rqv3t-tqm0w8OFC&msgVersion=web

Got into a game with 4 premades. I told them not to worry, we will win because I am a plat smurf. Ashe decides to suddenly bash me saying "Plat is easy to get to, I just started and will get to plat in 3 months."

I told him no you won't, it took me 4 years because I am not good and improving. He then continues to say how I have a sad life playing 4 years of league. His 3 friends just started laughing and trolling me. I told them my life is not sad at all because I go to a good school, and have plenty of wealth in my family, I am certainly living quite well.

They keep taunting me, so I started using a sarcastic tone calling Ashe "diamond" because he thinks plat is trash.

Afterwards, all 4 of them reported me and I immediately got banned. This is my FIRST offense ever and I never even got chat-restricted or even warnings.

Riot sent me this log in my email. I've seen other ppl get banned with logs like "go fucking die, youre r%%%%%ed, noob trash" etc. If you look at mine, I've never said anything offensive. In fact it was them who kept flaming me about my life, so I was just arguing with them.

This is definitely not 14 DAYS BAN WORTHY.

Riot you don't have to unban me, I just want you to acknowledge that this time your AUTOMATED CHAT SCAN SYSTEM IS FLAWED. Back in the tribunal days there would be no way I can get banned for something like this.

EDIT: From this the only lesson I learned is to next time bring 3 friends along, and bash the random, and when he tries to defend himself, we will all report him. The automated system will flag his account, scan the things he says, and gets him a 14 day ban. It's quite a perfect plan actually.

You aren't punished based on volume of reports. The only thing that them being a premade has to do with is that it was enough reports to trigger you getting scanned.

Having sex with their mom is completely implied. Implying something is completely subjective and in no way this AUTOMATED system can possibly assume implications of a certain meaning.

If I were to say "a person's skin is dark, stained with filth" it could be implied to be racist, but the AUTOMATED system will only punish chats which say the N-word and in no way would have enough intelligence to make analogies with metaphors.

Multiple mom jokes for no reason - you claim Kayle is hacking to start the match - you are in a verbal back and forth with another player pretty much all game... to what point and purpose?  14 day banworthy?  No.  Chat suspension worthy?  Yes.

This type of behavior is unacceptable in this community. When there is nothing good to say, don't say anything at all. As a community, **we also don't believe that retaliation is an appropriate response**, so in cases where there is retaliation, both players receive penalties. This is the only warning this account will receive. Further examples of toxic behavior can result in permanent closure of your account.
